ygData.subject: Re: TWINKING-- a discussion
ygData.msgSnippet: My opinion on twinking is varied. On one hand I agree with it. I have recieved and passed on many items. But the key was that they were not too far out of my
ygData.messageBody:
My opinion on twinking is varied. On one hand I
agree with it. I have recieved and passed on many
items. But the key was that they were not too far out of
my reach. One of my chars was asked if he was a good
person, I said I think so. I was then given a minotaur
ribcage and a two handed lamentation blade. Way out of
the reach of a character who is only 5 minutes old. A
fine steel blade, more acceptable to me. The funniest
sight I have seen was a full lambent covered bard
running for his life from deathfist pawns. Turns out he
was level one. That's ridiculous. Makes me root for
the monsters so his corpse would decay before he
recovered his stuff. Now the level 50 two account person
twinking his low level by ksing and camp stealing, death
to him. If it's reasonable, I don't have a problem
with it. I've given away many a 'low' thing to new
folks. But what really irks me are the ones who come up
and demand stuff. You've encountered them. No hail,
no nothing. Just a tell 'Gimme some plat'.
Repeatedly. Along with gimme some equipment. I died and don't
have anything. If so, wht are you in full ringmail and
carrying a sword while talking to me?! IDIOTS!!!
ARRRGGGHHHH. And we don't find your 'hey baby you're cute' and
worse messages arousing nor funny. It ruins the game
for some of us. Maybe the guys playing girls like it
but not I. It made me go and start a male character
to get away from it.<br><br>I seem to have gotten
off topic. Sorry. In summary: reasonable twink-ok,
unreasonable-bad<br><br>Keiyuki
